name: Silent Hill: Origins
description:
Silent Hill: Origins is an action game developed by Climax UK. It was originally released in 2007. It was published by Konami. Silent Hill: Origins has a Metascore of 78, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Silent Hill: Origins on PSP and PlayStation 2.
Akira Yamaoka and Mark Simmons produced the game. It was directed by Mark Simmons and Sam Barlow. Akira Yamaoka scored the game.
